comments:
Using java: j2sdk1.4.1_01

1. downloaded eclipse-SDK-M4-solaris-motif.zip
2. cd ~/apps
3. unzip eclipse-SDK-M4-solaris-motif.zip
4. cd eclipse
5. ./eclipse

6. shows the first splash screen ("Please wait... Completing install")
7. shows next splash screen (eclipse 2.1)
8. the screen stays up and fails to run

fails with the following messages being displayed:

===============================================================================

============================================================================== 

there isn't any log files that I can find (I looked under
$ECLIPSE/workspace/.metadata).... Any ideas?
Moving to UI based on stack trace.

Note the line: "Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException".
It looks as if the 2 static blocks in the PreferenceConverter were running in 
a different order.

I was not able to replicate this but I have refactored to the code to avoid 
the reported problem.

Fixed in build >20030203
*** Bug 50383 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
